section.p: This section provides sample EDRs for success and failure of notification delivery.

fig.codeblock: ------------------------------------- CDR length: 475 Release ID | Version ID: 7|2 Data record format | TS number: 1|7 Release identifier extension: 0 Name Tag Data RecordType 0 NotificationEvent messageId 1 5074841493349182 recipientId 1 http://10.75.52.110: 9999/spb/generichttpserver/offerlogging serverInstance 1 PRIMARY messageContent 1 This is a test message recipientServer 1 Rest sentTime 1 1596699948330 channel 1 REST notificationType 1 FAILURES entityId 1 Device notificationTemplateId 1 Template notificationVariable 1 CC:45,CB:567 notificationDeliveryResult 1 SUCCESS RecordTimestamp 1 06/08/2020 07:45:48

CDR length: 533 Release ID | Version ID: 7|2 Data record format | TS number: 1|7 Release identifier extension: 0 Name Tag Data RecordType 0 NotificationEvent messageId 1 5075167976491187 recipientId 1 http://10.75.52.110:9999/spb/ generichttpserver/offerlogging secondaryRecipientId 1 http://10.75.52.110:9998/spb/ generichttpserver/offerlogging messageContent 1 This is a test message recipientServer 1 Rest sentTime 1 1596700274759 channel 1 REST notificationType 1 FAILURES entityId 1 Device notificationTemplateId 1 Template notificationVariable 1 CC:45,CB:567 notificationDeliveryResult 1 FAILURE RecordTimestamp 1 06/08/2020 07:51:34
